body_html: It is totally up to you to write your own Dataset which will for instance make use of multiprocessing. A good point is to do the hard work when the Dataset is instantiated. Also when __getitem__() of your Dataset is called, your processes will do the job.
body_text: It is totally up to you to write your own Dataset which will for instance make use of multiprocessing. A good point is to do the hard work when the Dataset is instantiated. Also when __getitem__() of your Dataset is called, your processes will do the job.
body: It is totally up to you to write your own `Dataset` which will for instance make use of `multiprocessing`. A good point is to do the hard work when the `Dataset` is instantiated. Also when `__getitem__()` of your `Dataset` is called, your processes will do the job.
